DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Evaluation ( Serodase 5 mg Tablet ) Treatment Inflammation After Third Molar Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective , randomize , parallel , double blind Placebo- control study examine efficacy dose regimen serratiopeptidase ( serodase 5 mg ) 112 male females volunteer treatment inflammation third molar surgery , compare drug treatment v placebo period 20 week To assess dose effectiveness dose regimen Serodase 5 mg ; primary outcome trismus swell inflammation secondary outcome.the expect duration participant participation around 5 day divide 4 visit , time point measurment ( 0,2,4 5 day ) . The result expect assess improvement maximal interincisal distance , reduction swell improvment sensation post-operative pain .
